src:
Dos chicas terminaron presas por robar cosméticos en la Peatonal
05 Nov 2019 by Redacción Diario de Cuyo
Un llamado de alerta al 911 terminó con dos jóvenes detenidas. Sucedió anoche, en Capital. Las chicas habían robado cosméticos en un local de la Peatonal.
Eran las 20,14, cuando la policía fue alertada por un comerciante cuyo negocio está ubicado sobre calle Tucumán, entre Laprida y Rivadavia.
De inmediato, los efectivos comenzaron a recorrer la zona y, con la descripción que les habían brindado, dieron con dos jóvenes de 16 y 18 años a quienes les secuestraron “varios cosméticos”.
Ambas fueron trasladadas a la Comisaría 3era, a los fines de establecer los fines legales a seguir.
text:
Two girls ended up in prison for stealing cosmetics at the Pedestrian
05 Nov 2019 by Cuyo Daily Writing
An alert call to 911 ended with two young detainees. It happened last night, in Capital. The girls had stolen cosmetics at a Pedestrian location.
It was 8:14 pm, when police were alerted by a merchant whose business is located on Tucumán Street, between Laprida and Rivadavia.
Immediately, the troops began to tour the area and, with the description they had been given, they found two young people aged 16 and 18 who were kidnapped "several cosmetics".
Both were transferred to the 3rd Police Station, in order to establish the legal purposes to follow.
